column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////They have a small parking lot adjacent with limited amount of parking spots.  Once the lot fills up
column2: then basically your options are street parking in the neighborhood.  The line was long but steadily moving.  As you get closer to the counter to pay
column3: you can point out to the employees of what you want from the display and they will mount the plate for you.
